original: Luttropp, Fritz Hjalmar, tandläkare, Laholm, f. 22/4/69 i Rölanda, Älvsb. 1., av Vilhelm L. o. Sofia Marin. G. 94 m. Hilma Lidberg. Barn r Wera f. 95, g. m. O. von Cronsten, Oslo Dagmar 97, g. m. bankkamrer Ernst Gargin, Sthlm, Sten 03, ing., Västerås. — Mogrex. i Vänersb. 88, elev h. tandl R. Martin i Sthlm 89-91, tandl rkand. 90, tandläk. 91. Praktik i Arboga 92 -98, i Köping 98-20, ett 20-tal år i Västerås. Skoltandl. i Köping 05-20. Skol-tandl. i Laholm .sed. 40. Skattmäst. i Sv res ’skol- (o. tjänste-)tandlrfören. sed. dess stift. Skr. r art. betr. skol-tandv. i fack- o. dagspress. RVO.
translated: Luttropp, Fritz Hjalmar, dentist, Laholm, b. 22/4/69 in Rölanda, Älvsb. 1., son of Vilhelm L. and Sofia Marin. Married in 1894 to Hilma Lidberg. Children are Wera, born in 1895, married to O. von Cronsten in Oslo; Dagmar, born in 1897, married to bank cashier Ernst Gargin in Stockholm; Sten, born in 1903, engineer in Västerås. Started as an apprentice in Vänersborg in 1888, trained by dentist R. Martin in Stockholm from 1889-1891, registered dentist in 1890, qualified as a dentist in 1891. Practiced in Arboga from 1892-1898, in Köping from 1898-1920, and in Västerås for about 20 years. School dentist in Köping from 1905-1920, and school dentist in Laholm since 1940. Treasurer of the Swedish School Dental Association since its foundation. Author of articles on school dentistry in professional and daily newspapers. Recipient of the Royal Order of Vasa.
